title: Navaratna Chakra Jhumka - Auspicious Gemstone Earrings
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ). Features a fine Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Circular design embodying traditional chakra patterns. Each Navaratna gemstone is carefully selected and placed according to Vedic astrology principles. The gemstones are bezel set and surrounded by a halo of sparkling cubic zirconia. The floral design is intricate, reminiscent of ancient temple jewelry.
occasions: Ideal for auspicious occasions like weddings (పెళ్లి)
and other traditional ceremonies. These earrings also add a touch of elegance to modern ethnic wear and cocktail parties.
description: This pair of Navaratna earrings are not only beautiful but also hold immense traditional and astrological significance. The nine gemstones are believed to bring good luck, prosperity, and protection. Crafted with the highest quality gold and genuine gemstones, these earrings are a timeless investment and a cherished heirloom (వారసత్వ సంపద). The vibrant colors make these earrings a versatile accessory.
